alethinophidia.map

Class MapGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • alethinophidia.map.MapGrid
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapThumb

    public class MapGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible of drawing map on the screen, along with background image Also creates and holds MapReader instance
    Author:
    £ukasz Piotrowski
